name: DEVOUR/COMFORT
description:
The world has been weary. Your body is tired. Getting through the day, through all days, feels more quietly exhausting than ever before.

But there is something, you think, would help you recover. Would help you feel like you've really rested, relaxed, and recovered for the first time in months.

It's your own personal secret, but you truly believe it would help: Sleeping inside of a dragon's stomach. Just for a little while, long enough to relax. It's the only thing you've been able to think about.

You've found the dragon, but the thing is: She's not going to eat you just because you want her to.

You have to talk to her. And open up to her.

A relaxation focused vore twine, about trust and vulnerability.

This is a SOFT VORE game - no teeth, no biting, no blood, no messiness, and no digestion. Much like Jonah inside the whale, should you succeed, you'll eventually just be spit right back out - in an entirely non-gross fashion, I promise.
